Currently working as part of Ascend Group. I’� worki�g in the team as QA Specialist (technology-

Having the strong skills in test (manual, automation and security testing), training skills, teamwork, 
leadership and strong passion in the software testing areas. A type of « doer » person so I want to 
learn and do more in the innovation Katalon Studio product and company as KMS Technology.

(technology- focused) - apply the automated frameworks & tools to the projects. Training the team for automation and security testing, researching and building testing environment, documents, frameworks, improve software testing cycles and the current process.
Having the strong skills in test (manual, automation and security testing), training skills, teamwork, leadership and strong passion in the software testing areas. A type of « doer » person so I want to learn and do more in the innovation Katalon Studio product and company as KMS Technology.
